title: How to Make Fenugreek Pancake Syrup

steps.headline: Soak the fenugreek seeds in water for 20 minutes.
Add the soaking water with the seeds in it to a saucepan and bring it to the boil.
steps.description: Boil for about 5 minutes. The seeds will turn mushy.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
Pour into a suitable serving container.
steps.description: Place on the table with a stack of pancakes.

text: Soak the fenugreek seeds in water for 20 minutes.  Add the soaking water with the seeds in it to a saucepan and bring it to the boil. Boil for about 5 minutes. The seeds will turn mushy. Stir in the honey.  Remove from the heat and allow to cool.  Pour into a suitable serving container. Place on the table with a stack of pancakes. Finished.
